dio_messages.success: Success! Your operation was completed successfully.
dio_messages.bad_request_error: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
dio_messages.noContent: No content available at this moment.
dio_messages.forbiddenError: Insufficient permissions. You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this operation.
dio_messages.unauthorizedError: Authorization required. Please log in to continue.
dio_messages.notFoundError: Resource not found. The requested resource could not be located.
dio_messages.conflictError: Conflict detected. The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
dio_messages.internalServerError: Server error. An unexpected error has occurred on our end.
dio_messages.notAllowed: Method not supported. The method received in the request-line is known by the origin server but not supported by the target resource.
dio_messages.unknownError: Unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
dio_messages.timeoutError: Server timeout. The server did not respond in the expected time frame.
dio_messages.defaultError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
dio_messages.cacheError: Cache access error. An error occurred while trying to access the cache.
dio_messages.noInternetError: No internet connection. Please check your network and try again.
